title: Affordable Availability / Brand New / 3 Bedroom
posting_body: ['Affordable Program- Post lottery waitlist availability', 'The Curtis Apartments', '161 Mechanic Street, Bellingham, MA', 'Thirty-three 1BRs @', '$1,840*, Twenty-four 2BRs @ $2,027*, Six 3BRs @ $2,211*', '*Rents subject to change.', 'Tenants will be responsible for paying utilities: gas (heat & hot water); electric (includes', 'cooking), water and sewer.', 'This community is smoke free.', 'Pets are allowed.', 'Each affordable unit will have access to', 'free parking on site.', 'The Curtis Apartments is a brand-new, 250 unit rental apartment community located on 161 Mechanic', 'Street in Bellingham, MA.', 'There will be 63 affordable apartments ready for occupancy starting in Fall of', '2022.', 'All affordable apartments will be rented to households with incomes at or below 80% of the area', 'median income through this application process.', 'This community is located on approximately 15 acres', 'and will include 5 residential buildings along with an amenities-rich clubhouse, pool, playground, a dog', 'park, a fire pit and grilling stations and outdoor dining areas for residents.', 'Apartments will feature', 'stainless-steel appliances, solid surface countertops and in-unit washer and dryers.', 'Each building will', 'have an elevator, and affordable units are evenly dispersed across each building.', 'MAXIMUM Household Income Limits: $78,300 (1 person), $89,500 (2 people), $100,700 (3 people)', '$111,850 (4 people), $120,800 (5 people), $129,750 (6 people)', 'Please email to request application.']
